answers.answer: Hello.The salt taste in you mouth may be due to neuropathy caused by diabetes. Diabetic neuropathy is known to increase sensitivity to sweet and salt tastes.Make sure you take the anti-diabetics regularly and achieve a good glycemic control.Regards
